column2:
Uh-oh! Looks like `Blender` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you'd like to learn how to use it.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for `Blender`, and install it.

So, you're interested in 3d Modeling, {{user_name}}?

Your Hack system has access to Blender, a super-powerful 3d modeling program, through the App Center.

We've combed the web and found good guides to help you get started - and there are many more coming!

One important thing before you start - Blender is a complicated program with a lot of commands.

We *strongly* suggest you plug in a USB mouse with at *least* 3 buttons so that you can use everything properly.

You might also want a USB keyboard that has a 10-key number pad, so you can move the camera more easily.
I know that's a lot to take in - do you still want to continue?
I'll launch Blender - but you can also find it on the Desktop and launch it yourself.
Here are some resources for Blender - You can click the links to watch them in your web browser.
The best way to use these videos is to resize your windows so you can can see both Blender and the video.
That way, you can watch the video and follow along at the same time.

Something a little more advanced:
https://youtu.be/6mT4XFJYq-4

You can also use Blender Guru's beginner tutorial:
https://youtu.be/TPrnSACiTJ4
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips.
